member.name: M:opm_validation_service.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:opm_validation_service.CheckResultDescriptions.CodePrefixInvalid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to EAN/EIC not recognized (code should start with 85 or 27).

member.name: P:opm_validation_service.CheckResultDescriptions.EanInvalidCharacter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to EAN code is invalid. Only digits are valid characters..

member.name: P:opm_validation_service.CheckResultDescriptions.EanInvalidCheckCharacter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to EAN code is invalid. The check character is incorrect..

member.name: P:opm_validation_service.CheckResultDescriptions.EanInvalidLength
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to EAN code has to have the length of 18 characters..

member.name: P:opm_validation_service.CheckResultDescriptions.EanOk
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to EAN code is ok..

member.name: P:opm_validation_service.CheckResultDescriptions.EicInvalidCharacter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to EIC code is invalid. Only 0-9, A-Z and '-' are valid characters..

member.name: P:opm_validation_service.CheckResultDescriptions.EicInvalidCheckCharacter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to EIC code is invalid. The check character is incorrect..

member.name: P:opm_validation_service.CheckResultDescriptions.EicInvalidLength
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to EIC code has to have the length of 16 characters..

member.name: P:opm_validation_service.CheckResultDescriptions.EicOk
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to EIC code is ok..

member.name: P:opm_validation_service.CheckResultDescriptions.NoCodeSupplied
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No code supplied..
